member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.Detector.GetScreenDimensions(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the screens dimensions of the device made request in CSS pixels. If there is no match the dimensions will be 0.

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.Detector.GetScreenSize(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the screens size based on default screen ranges (in CSS pixels).
member.remarks: The default ranges are: Small (to 600) CSS pixels Medium (601-1024) CSS pixels Large (1025 - 1366) CSS pixels ExtraLarge (over 1366) CSS pixels

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.Detector.GetScreenSize(System.String,Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.ScreenRanges)
member.summary: Returns the screens size based on custom screen ranges (in CSS pixels).

member.name: T:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.DeviceModelData
member.summary: Used to serialize/deserialize the data about the devices - model and dimensions

member.name: T:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.DeviceScreenDimensions
member.summary: Contains the device dimensions in CSS pixels

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.DeviceScreenDimensions.Width
member.summary: Gets the device width in CSS pixels.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.DeviceScreenDimensions.Height
member.summary: Gets the device height in CSS pixels.

member.name: T:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.DeviceScreenSize
member.summary: The device screen size based on the its dimensions in CSS pixels
member.remarks: The default ranges are: Small (to 600) CSS pixels Medium (601-1024) CSS pixels Large (1025 - 1366) CSS pixels ExtraLarge (over 1366) CSS pixels

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.ScreenRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor of the ScreenRange class. The overload params are assigned to the public properties

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.ScreenRange.ContainsValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the provided value is inside the range

member.remarks: The values should considered as CSS pixels not as a standard ones

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.ScreenRange.Maximum
member.remarks: The values should considered as CSS pixels not as a standard ones

member.name: T:Telerik.Web.Device.Detection.ScreenRanges
member.summary: ScreenRanges is used to define custom ranges

member.summary: Gets or sets the extra large screen range
member.remarks: The range should considered in CSS pixels not as a standard ones
